price: Na kae εberε no a nkͻnkͻnsafoͻ no ne wͻn a yadeε wͻ wͻn akoma mu no kaa sε: ”Bᴐ a Nyankopͻn ne ne Somafoͻ hyεԑ yεn no yԑ nnaadaa bi kwa“.
arabic: وَإِذۡ يَقُولُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ مَّا وَعَدَنَا ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ إِلَّا غُرُورٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idh yaqūlu al-munāfiqūna wa-alladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun mā waʿadanā al-lahu warasūluhu illā ghurūran
